AFT.JO.summary: Afrimat Limited, an open pit mining company, provides industrial minerals and construction materials in South Africa. It operates through three segments: Construction Materials, Industrial Minerals, and Bulk Commodities. The Construction Materials segment offers aggregates, readymix concrete, building lime, bricks and blocks, roadlime, and silica products, as well as clinker supplies. The Industrial Minerals segment offers agriculture and animal hygiene lime, dolomite, and metallurgical calcite and dolomite products, as well as limestone. The Bulk Commodities segment mines for iron ores. It also offers drilling and blasting, mobile crushing, screening, and bid preparation and contractual services. Afrimat Limited was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bellville, South Africa.

OZV2.F.summary: PPC Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies cement, aggregates, readymix, lime and limestone, and fly ash products in South Africa, Botswana, Mozambique, Zimbabwe, Rwanda, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It also offers stone, sand, road layer materials, and special aggregate related products. The company was formerly known as Pretoria Portland Cement Company Limited and changed its name to PPC Ltd in October 2012. PPC Ltd was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.

SEP.JO.summary: Sephaku Holdings Limited operates in the building and construction materials industry in South Africa. It manufactures and supplies ready-mixed concrete products for the residential, commercial, and industrial markets. Sephaku Holdings Limited is based in Irene, South Africa.
